name: P R I M E C R E A T O R
description:
[SIMULATANEON SERIES #004]

P R I M E C R E A T O R

The Bufoon crawling in the margins of cosmic microwave background maps. It wears an inviting grin. If probed, it will spew half truths. It reveals itself exclusively where it's not seeked. It has a mind that wonders, and we are but a snake scale on its adventurous belly.

SIMULATANEON is a 2017 hypersigil and a conceptual prison break map for the upcoming matrix system update. The sigils that were borrowed for this series reveal only part of a bigger tapestry.
